name: One Night at Bendy's 2 (in development)
description:
story: after the events of ONAB 1, you don't know where you are. but..... bendy and his friends are back...

and You must HIDE so die

movement:

Bendy: starts in cam 1 backstage, then makes his way directly toward the left front hall.

boris: starts in cam 1 backstage, than makes his way directly to the right hall.

ink bendy: starts in cam 7 inky room, then makes his way to cam 10, which is the vent. seal the vent door or else, he will kill you.

ink blendy: starts in cam 7 inky room, then starts making his way directly to the right front hall.

Alice: starts in cam 1 backstage, and makes her way to the left hall.

golden bendy: if you see a bendy flashing in the cams, golden bendy is there. then makes his way to any door. if he appears in your office, flip up the cams.

golden bendybut: appears on random places flip down the cams if you see him on the cams. however, when he is in your office, you must tell the difference.

bendybut?: secret character.

characters:

alice

ink blendy.

bendybendybut (secret)ink bendygolden bendygolden bendybutboris
